name: BITE Data
description: BITE Data is a trade compliance screening platform that allows users to screen companies and products in their supply chain for risk in real time; classify commodities for accurate duty rates and tariffs; continuously monitor their supply chain and track their compliance audit tasks. We aim to disrupt the trade compliance screening market with self-service SaaS, and AI agents that provide alternative supply chain routes and product procurement.
one_liner: BITE Data is a trade compliance screening platform that allows users to screen companies and products in their supply chain for risk in real time; classify commodities for accurate duty rates and tariffs; continuously monitor their supply chain and track their compliance audit tasks. We aim to disrupt the trade compliance screening market with self-service SaaS, and AI agents that provide alternative supply chain routes and product procurement.
